pages.title: Combat Mode[2]: Rank

pages.text: $(#FF3333)Rank$() or sometimes referred to by people as "combo" is a combat ranking system that improves your abilities slightly as you fight well. At a simple level, rank increases when might increases, with each point worth of rank increasing the displayed letter. The final SS rank costs 2 levels worth of rank to gain, while to fill triple SSS it requires 3 bars.$(br2) Rank is further increased by small amounts related to the consumption of spirit and might for skills while also increasing whenever you $(l:patchouli:selfdefense/fracture0)fracture$() or defeat an enemy. The harder the fracture the more is gained.

As rank increases you gain an "adrenaline" hidden adrenaline buff that gives you small amounts of movement and attack speed as each rank increases. When taking damage this bonus is halved temporarily.  When you might has decayed from being out of combat rank will rapidly drop back down to empty again if not maintained.
